From what you've posted so far, it sounds like an interesting effort, and I=
 look forward to reading the entire study.

Also, from what you posted, it =
did not say they didn't use double-blind testing. It says one of the reason=
s they do not consider the current radio-sweep claims reliable, is that tho=
se making those claims do not do double blind tests.=C2=A0 

So if you are =
calling BS and clueless those who are not doing double blind testing, that =
begs the question - are you?


--- On Wed, 6/9/10, Frank Sumption <purpleal=
iengirl@...> wrote:

 =
   
      
      
      =C2=A0It's probably not kosher to post this, but I =
find this highly insulting to all of us. As usual, igonore all facts and al=
l other methods, such as EVPmaker, which forms all the voices inside=C2=A0t=
he computer. Ignore all phone EVP messages, ignore all voices heard with no=
 electronic aids. Ignore messages received via turned off TV and printers--=
and on and on, yet they know all about EVP..Ignore the fact that probably t=
housands use boxes successfully.

=C2=A0
"We have conducted a few listening=
 studies of reported radio-sweep EVP and the results have not been good. We=
 have also worked with a variety of such devices. Based on what we know abo=
ut trans-etheric influences, how EVP and visual forms of ITC are formed and=
 what we know about mediumship, it is difficult to fit radio-sweep into any=
 established hypothesis. Without solid research supporting it as producing =
EVP, it is impossible for us to recommend it or support its use. If there w=
ere double-blind studies conducted by experienced researchers that shows it=
 does produce phenomena, we would gladly promote it as an alternative techn=
ique.

=C2=A0
We are pretty sure that, in transform EVP (ordinary recorder)=
, the voice is formed in the electronics by transforming available audio-fr=
equency noise in an active part of the electronics such as a transistor jun=
ction. We think the process is amplification of a weak telekinetic signal v=
ia stochastic resonance and we have found that the optimum audio-frequency =
signal for this is a chaotic one rich in voice-frequencies with many transi=
ent perturbation. That is our working hypothesis. "

=C2=A0
=C2=A0I can't s=
ay who this is from, cuz almost certain I'd get sued. There's no double bli=
nd testing their BS either. Clueless!!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S


On Wed, Jun 9, 20=
10 at 1:24 AM, paracomm <xxxsinxxxsinxxx@ yahoo.com> wrote:


=C2=A0 



Wh=
en people start calling themselves experts at something that is not or may =
never be fully understood the crap gets deep. I love these so called expert=
s that tell us that we can only make contact using their exact methods and =
we need to refrain from any other way of doing research because in their ey=
es were just spinning our wheels. So we can't get communication from modifi=
ed radios and were all just hearing what we want I guess. I have heard it a=
ll,,"I wrote a book and im an expert" or "believe me that wont work, I know=
 cause im physic"=E2=80=A6.in one ear and out the other. Everyone is an exp=
ert these days and most of what they say is BS. If I start hearing someone =
or something talking through my dogs butt guess what im recording it.


Sou=
nds like these so called experts are just trying to deter and silence anyth=
ing they dont agree with by doing there Scientific tests. If it works it wo=
rks and if it didnt work what the hell are we all still doing here.
